tool.name: Select last
tool.help:
**Syntax**
This tool output the last part of the input file.
- **Show last** sets the number of lines to output. For example, **10** refers to output the last 10 lines of the selected query.
-----
**Example**
- Input File::
chr7 57134 57154 D17003_CTCF_R7 356 - chr7 57247 57267 D17003_CTCF_R4 207 + chr7 57314 57334 D17003_CTCF_R5 269 + chr7 57341 57361 D17003_CTCF_R7 375 + chr7 57457 57477 D17003_CTCF_R3 188 +
- Show last two lines of above file. The result is::
chr7 57341 57361 D17003_CTCF_R7 375 + chr7 57457 57477 D17003_CTCF_R3 188 +
